org.gridgain.grid
Interface GridCloudResource

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<GridCloudResource>, GridMetadataAware, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
GridCloudSpiResourceAdapter
public interface GridCloudResource
extends GridMetadataAware, Comparable<GridCloudResource>

Cloud resource defines any type of manageable resource on the cloud.

In GridGain a cloud is defined as a collection of resources where all resources in the cloud form a set of undirected graphs. Cloud resource defines any manageable resource in the specific cloud such as image, instance, profile, network attached storage, block device, etc. Each resource has a collection of adjacent resources returned by GridCloudResource.links() method. Note that links are bi-directional, i.e. if node A has a link to node B, node B always has link back to A for any two adjacent nodes A and B in the resource graph.

Note that this interface does not impose any parent-child or directional relationships on its collection of resources - although they exist in every specific case. In fact, the every cloud provider not only will have potentially different set of resources and/or resource types, but the parent-child relationship can be different as well. GridRichCloud interface provide convenient methods for navigating cloud resources graphs.

Cloud SPI is responsible for producing the cloud snapshot that includes cloud resource graphs.

GridCloud, GridRichCloud, GridCloudResourceType

Method Detail

type

int type()
Gets type of the resource.

Resource types are defined in GridCloudResourceType class. They are specifically constants and not enumerations to allow for user-defined type of resources.

Returns:
Resource type.
See Also:
GridCloudResourceType

id

String id()
Gets ID of this resource. This is vendor specific value that is provided by the cloud provider.

Returns:
Resource ID.

cloudId

String cloudId()
Gets ID of the cloud this resource belongs to.

Returns:
Cloud ID.

links

@Nullable
Collection<GridCloudResource> links()
Gets collection of resources adjacent to this resource.

Returns:
Collection of adjacent resources. May return null if there are no adjacent resources for this resource.

parameters

@Nullable
Map<String,String> parameters()
Gets map of parameters that cloud provides associates with this resource. Depending on cloud SPI implementation this map can change from call to call as it can be re-acquired on each change in the cloud topology. Consult cloud SPI implementation for more details.

Returns:
Map of parameters associated with this resource. This map can be changing from call to call depending on specific cloud SPI implementation.
